sentence.text: In this study, we performed exome-wide association studies (EWASs) to identify genetic variants that confer susceptibility to ischemic stroke, intracerebral hemorrhage (ICH), or subarachnoid hemorrhage (regulation of blood pressure).

Multivariable logistic regression analysis with adjustment for age, multicellular organism development and the prevalence of hypertension and diabetes mellitus revealed that 4 of these SNPs [rs3212335 of GABRB3 (P=0.0036; odds ratio, 1.29), rs147783135 of proteolysis (P=0.0024; odds ratio, 0.37), rs2292661 of protein folding (P=0.0054; odds ratio, 0.35) and rs191885206 of very long-chain fatty acid metabolic process (P=0.0082; odds ratio, 2.60)] were related (P<0.01) to ischemic stroke.

entity.text: very long-chain fatty acid metabolic process

sentence.text: Multivariable logistic regression analysis with adjustment for age, multicellular organism development and the prevalence of hypertension revealed that rs138533962 of peptidyl-tyrosine phosphorylation (P<1.0x10-23; odds ratio, 111.3) was significantly (P<2.60x10-4) associated with ICH and that rs117564807 of hemidesmosome assembly (P=0.0009; odds ratio, 2.23x10-8) was significantly (P<0.0010) associated with regulation of blood pressure.
